explains: n. 旁观者；观众（等于 spectator）

sentences.en: One onlooker flew in with a friend Thursday from New York.
sentences.cn: 一位观众在周四和一位朋友从纽约飞过来。

sentences.en: "What if she is suffering from a stroke?" one onlooker said.
sentences.cn: 一旁观者说：“老太太要是中风怎么办啊？”

sentences.en: "You're killing him," a concerned onlooker once told him.
sentences.cn: “你会杀了他的，”一个忧心忡忡的旁观者曾经这样对彼得•科说。
